synopsis.text: Before the backdrop of the Happiness House, a colossal tree adorned with a myriad of quaint dwellings, Michi and her family embark on a new chapter in their lives. Upon exploring her new bedroom, Michi stumbles upon an unusual nut-like object, from which emerges an enigmatic creature named Nanami-chan. The two form an instant bond, embarking on a series of mini escapades together with the other eccentric inhabitants of the Happiness House. From nurturing a hamster to embarking on a diet, and even safeguarding their home from a thief, Michi, Nanami-chan, and the Aoba family experience an array of adventures that foster growth, learning, and camaraderie.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
